name: Proper Canadian Postal Code
description:
This will locate a Canadian Postal Code (with or without a space or a dash/hyphen) anywhere. Case-Insensitive.

The first character of the Canadian Postal Code will never have these characters (DFIOQUWZ).
content:
Sample text:
abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ
0123456789 +-.,!@#$%^&*();\/|<>"'
12345 -98.7 3.141 .6180 9,000 +42
555.123.4567	+1-(800)-555-2468
foo@demo.net	bar.ba@test.co.uk
www.demo.com	http://foo.co.uk/
http://regexr.com/foo.html?q=bar

Example of typical Canadian Addresses:

NAME OF MEMBER OF PARLIAMENT
HOUSE OF COMMONS
OTTAWA ON K1A 0A6
CANADA

Westminster International Inc.
174 West Beaver Creek Road
Richmond Hill, Ontario L4B 1B4
Canada

Address of Santa Claus (NOTE: North Pole Post Office will open again on November 3, 2014)

Santa Claus
North Pole, H0H 0H0
Canada

Various Postal Code Samples: 

Will Work 			Won't Work
============================
h0h0h0 				3B7-C9B
H0h0H0 				h00h00
H0H0H0 				0H0-H0H
H0H0h0 				91029-0050 (US ZIP Code)
h0h 0h0				H0H0H
H0H 0H0 				Q4B 1B4 (starts with either DFIOQUZ)
h0h-0h0 				F3Z-9I4 (starts with either DFIOQUZ)
H0H-0H0 
L4B 1B4
L4B-1B4 
L4b 1b4
K1Y3B7
author: TechStud
